name: DiceWay (Murilo da Rosa Bezerra, BeBoi)
description:
Get to the flag and catch stars on levels that exist both in 3D and 2D. Use strategy and throws before you run out of dice!

Control your aim and power before each throw to reach the perfect spot! Make a path that gets you to the end and through all the stars!

Each dice will turn into a platform, but their element won't always be favorable to you!

The dice you throw in 3D mode will turn into platforms in a 2D environment.

-----

CONTROLS 3D:

Mouse - Aim dice

LMB - Throw dice

2D:

WASD & Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

----

ELEMENTAL PLATFORMS

Air: It makes you jump higher.

Earth: A normal and solid path.

Ice: A slippery path.

Fire: You may touch it for jumping higher with a little burnt, but only once. The second time will end you.

Spirit: Each one of your jumps changes its status. Solid or immaterial.

Metal: Spikes that will end you.

----
